description:
Katsura reveals to Kondo that he got himself caught on purpose, and tells him about his ingenious scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de l`adieu au Shinsengumi 3: Objet oublié
Farewell Shinsengumi Arc Part Three: Lost and Found
Saraba Shinsengumi Hen San: Mamore Mono
さらば真選組篇三 忘れもの
